dcterms:creator: Mathias Gehrig
Willem Aarents
Daniel Gehrig
Davide Scaramuzza
dcterms:description: A stereo event camera dataset for driving scenarios, containing high-resolution events and optical flow ground truths from daytime and nighttime outdoor driving under various lighting conditions.
dcterms:title: DSEC

dcterms:creator: Alex Zihao Zhu
Liangzhe Yuan
dcterms:description: A dataset used for self-supervised optical flow estimation for event-based cameras, although it has smaller optical flow magnitudes compared to DSEC.
dcterms:title: MVSEC
